headline.main: Live Blog: Daschle Returns to the Senate

docs.abstract: Former Majority Leader Tom Daschle returns to his former haunts for his confirmation hearing.
docs.lead_paragraph: Wrap Up Mr. Daschle's appearance today before the Health, Education, Labor and Pensions Committee was by no means his last. While the HELP committee heard his views on various health issues, its members do not vote in committee on Mr. Daschle's confirmation. Next week, he is expected to appear before the Finance Committee, which does take a formal vote.
docs.snippet: Former Majority Leader Tom Daschle returns to his former haunts for his confirmation hearing.

docs.lead_paragraph: The following is a transcript of the senate confirmation hearing nominating Senator Tom Daschle as Secretary of Heath and Human Services, as provided by CQ Transcriptions.

headline.sub: Urges Antiobesity Programs as Union Members Protest Budget Cuts ;
headline.print_headline: Governor Says New York Is in a Perilous Situation
headline.main: Governor Says New York Is in a Perilous Situation

byline.original: By DANNY HAKIM and NICHOLAS CONFESSORE

docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. David A. Paterson's sobering State of the State address came as thousands of union members gathered outside the Capitol to protest his proposed budget cuts.
docs.snippet: Gov. David A. Paterson's sobering State of the State address came as thousands of union members gathered outside the Capitol to protest his proposed budget cuts.

docs.lead_paragraph: Arguing that this is the wrong time to hunker down and accomplish nothing, Gov. David Paterson of New York has presented a low-budget wish list that is full of compelling new ideas.
docs.snippet: Arguing that this is the wrong time to hunker down and accomplish nothing, Gov. David Paterson of New York has presented a low-budget wish list that is full of compelling new ideas.
